hero.title: Privacy Policy for {website.name}
hero.subtitle: We value your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal information

mission.title: Our Privacy Commitment
mission.description: At {website.name}, we take your privacy seriously. This policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your data when you use our platform and services.

items.title: Information We Collect
items.description: We collect personal information such as email, name, and usage data, as well as content you upload like videos and stats.

items.title: How We Use Your Data
items.description: Your information is used to provide services, improve our platform, communicate with you, and comply with legal requirements.

items.title: Data Sharing
items.description: We may share data with service providers, in business transfers, or when required by law. We do not sell your personal information.

items.title: Security Measures
items.description: We implement industry-standard security practices to protect your data from unauthorized access or disclosure.

items.title: Your Rights and Choices
items.description: You can access, update, delete your data, and opt-out of certain communications. Contact us for privacy requests.

items.title: Cookies and Tracking
items.description: We use cookies for functionality and analytics. You can manage cookie preferences through your browser settings.

team.title: Updates to This Policy
team.description: We may update this privacy policy periodically. We will notify you of significant changes via email or platform announcements.
